t: Amazon launches first Kuiper internet satellites, taking on Starlink | Reuters
s: 1 month ago - The first 27 satellites for Amazon's Kuiper broadband internet constellation were launched into space from Florida on Monday, kicking off the long-delayed deployment of an internet-from-space network that will rival SpaceX's Starlink.
